ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader.FileIO
      • ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppObservable, java.io.Serializable

    public class User
extends FileIO
implements java.io.Serializable, AppObservable
    Created by jjohnston on 10/30/15. Represents a user (one for each phone accessing the app) and their related information (profile). Also contains an inventory which lists the games owned by that user.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
